channel.title: Travel on Nuttaphat Arunoprayoch
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on Nuttaphat Arunoprayoch

item.title: Sun Moon Lake e-Passes
item.description: Sun Moon Lake is one of the most famous attractions where most tourists who are in Taichung want to visit. Travelling there, of course, is well-known to be time-consuming; moreover, it can be costly. Therefore, several travelling packages are available for purchase at the HSR, TRA, Nantou Bus station, etc. which help save a lot of money. Generally, we would get paper tickets after purchasing. Recently, in order to match up with an increasing number of mobile usage, The Nantou government has introduced e-Passes which can be purchased online.
